withthikaru wisin mathukala pradhana tharka dekaki.enam 1.jo abewikrama mahatha eki kruthiye rupawahini ayithiya wikuna athi heyin jo abewikrama mahathata eki teli natyaye ayithiyak nomathi bawath ee ayithiya aththe jathika rupawahiniyata bawathya.namuth ema tharkaya adhikaranaya prathikshepa karamin kiya sitiye paminilikara jo abewikrama mahatha adala giwisuma magin eki natya jathika rupawahiniyata pamanak wikashanaya kirimata pamanak ayithiya laba di athi bawath wenath rupawahini aayathanawalata wikinimata awasara di nathi bawayi.ese heyin eki teli natya wenath rupawahini aayathanawalata ho wenath kenekuta wikinimata ayithiya aththe jo abewikrama mahathata bawathya . 2.withthikaru dewana karuna lesata idiripath kale thaman eki rupawahini teli natya widiyo kota thamage sanrakshanagaraye sanrakshanaya kale sathbhawayen bawath ewani teli natya 30 k pamana thamange sanrakshanagaraye sanrakshanaya kara athi bawathya.ee anuwa buddhimaya depala panathe 11 wana waganthiya yatathe ewannak kirimata jo abewikrama mahathagen awasara laba ganimata awashya nathi bawayi.

kese wuwada pasugiya sathiyaka pamana kalayaka sita atamassa aagiya athak natha.meaakarayata blogayak athurudan wima apa athdakke mita wasarakata pamana pera tabu sabjekt blogaya athurudan wimeni.(tabu nathiwieman aැthiwu rikthakaya pirawimata aැtamassa dayaka wu bawa ෙbaehaෙdana piligannawa aැtha) namuth ehidi blogkaruwa athurudan wimakata lak nowu athara blog awakashaya purama me siddhiya wiwidhakarayek kathabahata lakwu awasthawala tabu (enam tabu sabjekt hi lekhakaya) da eeha madihath wanu daknata labini.thama blogaya yam kadakappalkari pudugalayeku ho pirisak wisin hak kara athi bawa ohu mewan thanwaladi kiya sitiyeya.(meya da wiwadapanna wu athara ෙnaeyak akara matha ha nigamana me sambandhawa digaharenu nirikshanaya kala haki wiya)
